sentences.en: Car-parks are few, crammed, and outrageously expensive.
sentences.cn: 停车场数量少，车位挤，并且停车费高得离谱。

sentences.en: Despite her tiny body, she had a certain sexuality, flirting outrageously with my brother, David.
sentences.cn: 尽管她个子小, 但她曾有过某种性倾向, 她竟然与我的大卫兄弟调情.

sentences.en: Doctor Winter pulled out a chair outrageously and sat down again.
sentences.cn: 温特医生很生气地拉出一张椅子来坐了下去.

sentences.en: He behaved outrageously when he was young.
He criticized them for dressing outrageously and posing pretentiously.
sentences.cn: 他批评她们衣着暴露而且矫揉造作。

sentences.en: He flatters her outrageously , and she swallows it whole , ie believes it entirely.
sentences.cn: 他极力奉承她, 而她竟以为完全是由衷之言.

sentences.en: Leila kept smiling her outrageously cute smile.
sentences.cn: 莱拉脸上始终挂着非常可爱的笑容.

sentences.en: Many west Europeans , faced with severe recession at home, will see this as outrageously unfair.
sentences.cn: 很多本国正面临严重衰退的西欧人将为此愤愤不平.

sentences.en: Sally may seem a bit wild, but sometimes her remarks outrageously funny.
sentences.cn: 莎莉说话可能有点儿粗, 但是她的话真的有时候让人忍俊不禁.

sentences.en: She flirted with him outrageously at times.
sentences.cn: 她有时露骨地跟他调情。

sentences.en: Students who behave outrageously and refuse to mend their ways despite repeated admonitions should be expelled.
sentences.cn: 对于表现太坏又屡教不改的,要开除学籍.

sentences.en: The passing of time somehowencouraged people like Abe to be acting so outrageously, thinking there are notmany people like you who can challenge him with the real life experience.
sentences.cn: 时间的流逝，让一些像安倍一样的人开始肆无忌惮起来，认为不会有多少像你一样，具有真是生活经历的人能够挑战他。

sentences.en: The Tai Zhou massage centre outrageously like this!
sentences.cn: 台州按摩中心如此肆无忌惮!

sentences.en: There is a fine of 50 dollars for later time parking which outrageously high.
sentences.cn: 超时停车罚款50美元,高得令人不能容忍.

sentences.en: These TV dinners are outrageously priced.
sentences.cn: 这些冷冻快餐贵得令人发指.

words.tran_cn: 粗暴的；可恶的；令人吃惊的
凌辱，强奸；对…施暴行；激起愤怒

trans.tran_cn: 凶残地，肆无忌惮地，令人不能容忍地，不寻常地
